creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque consisting of a bar strap attached to a crescent-shaped, thick, hollow piece of silver; the crescent curves over on itself at each end; crescent has ten dangling chime pieces - one is missing so there should be ten; crescent decorated with fat dragon at center; on the left there is a peacock-like bird; on the right there is a fish-like creature with large eyes, fins, and whiskers; background of flowers and dots
dimension: 15 1/2 x 12 3/4 x 4 in. (39.37 x 32.39 x 10.16 cm) (with chimes hanging)
title: Torque
